_header: I have set my heart so high
Title(s): My Heart is set on the Love of Christ
Subjects: Christ, love of; songs; sermons, verse
_description: My Heart is set on the Love of Christ — two five-line stanzas with music

BodDou381.First Lines:
I have set my hert so hyme likyth no love þat lower
                    ys…
BodDou381.Last Lines:
…for love me haþ in balus browȝtme þenk yt
                    haþ ywis

CULIi38.Transcription:
hi haue yseht myn hert so hyeme lykyth no loue þat lower
                    is
CULIi38.Note:
2 lines only, in a Latin sermon, ‘Venite Benedicti patris
                        mei’.
